text: Betsy's Wedding is a 1990 American romantic comedy movie. It was directed by Alan Alda and produced by Martin Bregman. It stars Molly Ringwald as Betsy. Ally Sheedy plays Connie. Catherine O'Hara plays Gloria. Madeline Kahn plays Lola. Betsy's Wedding got mixed reviews from critics. The run time is 94 minutes. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1990 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies about weddings
title: Betsy's Wedding
